tags: Antihero Protagonist   Betrayal   Demon Lord   Demons   Game Elements   Gods   Heroes   Humanoid Protagonist   Level System   Male Protagonist   Royalty   Ruthless Protagonist   Summoned Hero

description: Alex was forcibly summoned and had to become the Hero. Used and betrayed by everyone around him, Alex remembered the banal life he had in his old world. Finally understanding his true enemy, he swears to get his revenge from the gods and reign as the demon king>
